title: Executor contact details
question: What are {executorName}’s email address and mobile number?
questionHint: This executor will be contacted and asked to confirm details of the estate.
email2: This must be the executor’s own email address
mobileHint: This must be the executor’s own mobile phone number. For example, 07900123456 or +33123456789

email.duplicate: You have used this email address for another executor

mobile.invalid: Enter a mobile phone number without spaces, international numbers must start with a plus sign
mobile.isNotNumber: Phone number must only contain numbers. International numbers must also start with a plus sign.
mobile.tooShort: Phone number must be 11 characters or more.
mobile.tooLong: Phone number must be 15 characters or less.
mobile.duplicate: You have used this mobile phone number for another executor
